description.en:
Eutaria is an off-chain and play-to-earn crypto currency. The project is deployed in the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network and requires players to hold Eutaria token to unlock play-to-earn features.

Our goal is to provide players sustainable rewards and play-to-earn without gas fees. The earnings of the players will be in-game currency and fixed value equivalent to USD.
The earnings can be claimed and automatically converted to BNB. We are using a scalable cloud server for off-chain transactions that is highly secure and has an automatic backup.
